set up perspective peprojection matrix with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE mat4s glms_perspective_lh_no (float fovy, float aspect, float nearZ, float farZ)
set up perspective projection matrix with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE mat4s glms_persp_move_far_lh_no (mat4s proj, float deltaFar)
extend perspective projection matrix's far distance with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE mat4s glms_perspective_default_lh_no (float aspect)
set up perspective projection matrix with default near/far and angle values with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE mat4s glms_perspective_resize_lh_no (mat4s proj, float aspect)
resize perspective matrix by aspect ratio ( width / height ) this makes very easy to resize proj matrix when window /viewport reized with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].

decomposes frustum values of perspective projection. with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decompv_lh_no (mat4s proj, float dest[6])
decomposes frustum values of perspective projection. this makes easy to get all values at once with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decomp_x_lh_no (mat4s proj, float *__restrict left, float *__restrict right)
decomposes left and right values of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1]. x stands for x axis (left / right axis)
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decomp_y_lh_no (mat4s proj, float *__restrict top, float *__restrict bottom)
decomposes top and bottom values of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1]. y stands for y axis (top / botom axis)
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decomp_z_lh_no (mat4s proj, float *__restrict nearZ, float *__restrict farZ)
decomposes near and far values of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1]. z stands for z axis (near / far axis)
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decomp_far_lh_no (mat4s proj, float *__restrict farZ)
decomposes far value of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE void glms_persp_decomp_near_lh_no (mat4s proj, float *__restrict nearZ)
decomposes near value of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE float glms_persp_fovy_lh_no (mat4s proj)
returns field of view angle along the Y-axis (in radians) with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE float glms_persp_aspect_lh_no (mat4s proj)
returns aspect ratio of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
CGLM_INLINE vec4s glms_persp_sizes_lh_no (mat4s proj, float fovy)
returns sizes of near and far planes of perspective projection with a left-hand coordinate system and a clip-space of [-1, 1].
